No tone differentiation

For systems that present audio alerts, notifications, and other events, people may need characteristics other than tone differentiation to distinguish between different audio events or obtain information from such audio events.

Comment on this item

AuditoryNotificationsDefault

References

  • Reference: 5-2-5-i to have audio feedback independent of tone differentiation
